Uses of Class
pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey

  • Packages that use PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey 
    Package Description
    pengu.messenger
    This package provides the Working classes for Pengu Messenger.

    • Uses of PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey in pengu.messenger

      Methods in pengu.messenger that return PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey[] PenguMessengerClient.searchForOtherUsers(java.lang.String username)
      Makes a search for users and their public keys.
      PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey[] PenguMessengerRESTClient.searchUsers(java.lang.String username, int page)
      Makes a request for user public keys, specified by a username (Search term), and a page number (If there are many results).
